description: Lightweight market research automation using local and remote MCP servers

tasks.title: Research AI Development Tools Landscape
tasks.description: Conduct web research on current AI development tools and frameworks, focusing on code generation and developer productivity tools.
acceptanceCriteria: Use Brave Search to find top 5-7 AI development tools
Identify key features and pricing models
Document competitive advantages and market positioning
Generate structured findings in markdown format
technicalRequirements: Remote MCP server for Brave Search integration
Local MCP server for file operations and report generation
Web research and data extraction capabilities
tasks.details: This task requires using remote MCP servers to search the web for information about AI development tools like GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Claude Code, etc. The research should focus on market positioning, key features, and pricing. Results should be processed and saved locally using local MCP server capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that both remote (Brave Search) and local (file operations) MCP servers are working correctly. Confirm that research data is collected, processed, and saved as a structured report.

tasks.title: Analyze Local Development Environment Tools
tasks.description: Research and analyze tools for local development environments, focusing on setup automation and developer experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Research development environment tools and platforms
technicalRequirements: Web search capabilities via remote MCP
Local file analysis and report generation
tasks.details: Focus on tools like Docker Desktop, VS Code Dev Containers, GitHub Codespaces, and similar platforms. Use web research to gather information, then combine with local file analysis to create a comprehensive comparison report.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure both remote research and local file processing work together. Test that the report integrates findings from the previous task and creates a coherent analysis.

tasks.title: Generate Market Research Summary Report
tasks.description: Synthesize research findings into a comprehensive market summary with recommendations.
acceptanceCriteria: Combine findings from previous research tasks
Generate executive summary of market landscape
technicalRequirements: Local MCP server for file operations and report compilation
Markdown and potentially other format generation
tasks.details: This task primarily uses local MCP server capabilities to read the previous research reports, analyze the data, and generate a comprehensive summary. Should include market trends, competitive analysis, and strategic recommendations.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that local MCP server can read and process files from previous tasks. Confirm that the final report synthesizes information correctly and provides valuable insights.

metadata.testingNotes: This project is designed to test both remote and local MCP server integration while keeping API usage minimal.
